docs.snippet: International relations are severely strained and a new world outlook is needed, especially in this country, to bring abort "a happier and more pacific frame of mind," J. Butler Wright, the newly appointed Minister to Uruguay, said yesterday at a...
docs.lead_paragraph: International relations are severely strained and a new world outlook is needed, especially in this country, to bring abort "a happier and more pacific frame of mind," J. Butler Wright, the newly appointed Minister to Uruguay, said yesterday at a luncheon given in his honor by the Pan-American Society at the Bankers Club.
